snippet: Tracy Martin, head of the new Morbid Anatomy Museum, and Vince Clarke, the synth pop musician, live in a house that reflects both their passions.
abstract: Tracy Martin, chief executive of the Morbid Anatomy Museum in Gowanus, Brooklyn, resides in 19th-century brownstone in Park Slope, Brooklyn, that is decorated in manner reflecting her obsession with the macabre.
lead_paragraph: Tracy Martin, head of the new Morbid Anatomy Museum, and Vince Clarke, the synth pop musician, live in a house that reflects both their passions.
